verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; A Psalm of David, a Song. Let <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%>, let his <S%H341>enemies<s%> be <S%H6327>scattered<s%>; Let them also that <S%H8130>hate<s%> him <S%H5127>flee<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

As <S%H6227>smoke<s%> is driven <S%H5086>away<s%>, so drive them <S%H5086>away<s%>: As <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H4549>melteth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, So let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
But let the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%>; let them <S%H5970>exult<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H5970>Yea<s%>, let them rejoice with <S%H8057>gladness<s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to his <S%H8034>name<s%>: Cast up a <S%H5549>highway<s%> for him that <S%H7392>rideth<s%> through the <S%H6160>deserts<s%>; His <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>; and <S%H5937>exult<s%> ye before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
A <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and a <S%H1781>judge<s%> of the <S%H490>widows<s%>, Is <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation<s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> <S%H3427>setteth<s%> the <S%H3173>solitary<s%> in <S%H1004>families<s%>: He bringeth <S%H3318>out<s%> the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> into <S%H3574>prosperity<s%>; But the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in a parched <S%H6707>land<s%>.
O <S%H430>God<s%>, when thou wentest <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, When thou didst <S%H6805>march<s%> through the <S%H3452>wilderness<s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7493>trembled<s%>, The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> also <S%H5197>dropped<s%> rain at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H2088>Yon<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> trembled at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Thou <S%H430><s%>, O God, didst <S%H5130>send<s%> a <S%H5071>plentiful<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>, Thou didst <S%H3559>confirm<s%> thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, when it was <S%H3811>weary<s%>.
Thy <S%H2416>congregation<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H430>therein<s%>: Thou, O God, didst <S%H3559>prepare<s%> of thy <S%H2896>goodness<s%> for the <S%H6041>poor<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> the <S%H562>word<s%>: The women that <S%H1319>publish<s%> the tidings are a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6635>host<s%>.
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of <S%H6635>armies<s%> <S%H5074>flee<s%>, they <S%H5074>flee<s%>; And she that <S%H5116>tarrieth<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H2505>divideth<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>.

When ye <S%H7901>lie<s%> among the <S%H8240>sheepfolds<s%>, It is as the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H3123>dove<s%> <S%H2645>covered<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%>, And her <S%H3671>pinions<s%> with <S%H3422>yellow<s%> <S%H2742>gold<s%>.
When the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H6566>scattered<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H7949>therein<s%>, It was as when it snoweth in <S%H6756>Zalmon<s%>.
A <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>; A <S%H1386>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> is the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

Why <S%H7520>look<s%> ye <S%H1386>askance<s%>, ye high <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, At the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H2530>desired<s%> for his <S%H3427>abode<s%>? <S%H3068>Yea<s%>, Jehovah will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it for <S%H5331>ever<s%>.

The <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> are twenty <S%H7239>thousand<s%>, even <S%H505>thousands<s%> upon <S%H8136>thousands<s%>; The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is among <S%H5514>them<s%>, as in Sinai, in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H5927>ascended<s%> on <S%H4791>high<s%>, thou hast led <S%H7628>away<s%> <S%H7628>captives<s%>; Thou hast <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>, <S%H5637>Yea<s%>, among the rebellious <S%H3050>also<s%>, that Jehovah <S%H430>God<s%> might dwell with <S%H7931>them<s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, who <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H6006>beareth<s%> our <S%H410>burden<s%>, Even the God who is our <S%H3444>salvation<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
God <S%H410><s%> is unto us a <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H4190>deliverances<s%>; And unto <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> belongeth <S%H8444>escape<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>.

But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4272>smite<s%> through the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies<s%>, The <S%H8181>hairy<s%> <S%H6936>scalp<s%> of such a one as goeth on <S%H1980>still<s%> in his <S%H817>guiltiness<s%>.
The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will bring <S%H7725>again<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> from the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>;

That thou mayest crush <S%H4272>them<s%>, dipping thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H1818>blood<s%>, That the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of thy <S%H3611>dogs<s%> may have its portion from thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
They have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H1979>goings<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, Even the <S%H1979>goings<s%> of my <S%H410>God<s%>, my <S%H4428>King<s%>, into the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>.
The <S%H7891>singers<s%> went <S%H6923>before<s%>, the <S%H5059>minstrels<s%> followed <S%H310>after<s%>, In the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5959>damsels<s%> playing with <S%H8608>timbrels<s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> ye <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4721>congregations<s%>, Even the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, ye that are of the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

There is <S%H6810>little<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> their <S%H7287>ruler<s%>, The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and their <S%H7277>council<s%>, The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>.
Thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength<s%>: <S%H5810>Strengthen<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, that <S%H2098>which<s%> thou hast wrought for <S%H6466>us<s%>.
Because of thy <S%H1964>temple<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H4428>Kings<s%> shall <S%H2986>bring<s%> presents unto <S%H7862>thee<s%>.

Rebuke <S%H1605><s%> the wild <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7070>reeds<s%>, The <S%H2416>multitude<s%> of the <S%H47>bulls<s%>, with the <S%H5695>calves<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, Trampling under <S%H7511>foot<s%> the <S%H7518>pieces<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: He hath <S%H967>scattered<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> that <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H7128>war<s%>.
Princes <S%H2831><s%> shall come <S%H857>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall haste to stretch <S%H7323>out<s%> her <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, ye <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; Oh sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto the <S%H136>Lord<s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

To him that <S%H7392>rideth<s%> upon the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> of <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, which are of <S%H6924>old<s%>; <S%H5414>Lo<s%>, he uttereth his <S%H6963>voice<s%>, a <S%H5797>mighty<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
Ascribe <S%H5414><s%> ye <S%H5797>strength<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>: His <S%H1346>excellency<s%> is over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, And his <S%H5797>strength<s%> is in the <S%H7834>skies<s%>.

O <S%H430>God<s%>, thou art <S%H3372>terrible<s%> out of thy holy <S%H4720>places<s%>: The <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, he <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H5797>strength<s%> and <S%H5797>power<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>. <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H430>God<s%>.
